title: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
description: Bug 12906[Editor Mgmt] If file is already opened in one editor, cannot open in another editor (should give error msg)
OB: When trying to open a file that is already opened in one editor, there is no error message or warning displayed. The file is simply not opened in the new editor.
EB: However, there should be a warning or error message displayed when attempting to open a file that is already opened in one editor, indicating that the file is already open and cannot be opened in another editor simultaneously.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a file in one editor.
2. Attempt to open the same file in another editor.
